article_title: California revamps addiction treatment for Medi-Cal recipients
article_text:
The state is the first to overhaul substance abuse treatment for Medicaid recipients

State officials will enjoy new flexibility to improve outcomes for substance abusers

Medi-Cal beneficiaries will be eligible for up to two 90-day residential stays each year

article_metadata.news-keywords: medi-cal, drug treatment, substance abuse, CRI-Help
article_metadata.description: California is overhauling its substance abuse treatment system for low-income people, embarking on a massive experiment to create a smoother path for addicts from detox through recovery.
